company.name: SM Technology
company.description: SM Technology is a leading IT service provider and a sister concern of bdCalling IT. It specializes in mobile app development, website development, AI solutions, CMS development, and data entry services.

parent_company_info.name: bdCalling IT
parent_company_info.global_presence: bdCalling IT is a global company with six sister concerns.

services.name: Mobile App Development
services.description: We create high-performance Android and iOS mobile applications using Flutter, React Native, and native technologies.

services.name: Website Development
services.description: Custom website design and development using technologies like React, Next.js, Laravel, and WordPress.

services.name: Artificial Intelligence (AI) Solutions
services.description: We build AI-powered applications, chatbots, and machine learning solutions for various industries.

services.name: CMS Development
services.description: We provide content management system (CMS) development solutions using WordPress, Strapi, and custom-built frameworks.

services.name: Data Entry Services
services.description: We offer accurate and efficient data entry services for businesses and enterprises.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of SM Technology?
faq.answer: SM Technology is a sister concern of bdCalling IT. The CEO of bdCalling IT is MD. Monir Hossain.

faq.question: Who is the GM of SM Technology?
faq.answer: The General Manager (GM) of SM Technology is MD. Shamim Miah.

faq.question: Who is the GM of Sales in SM Technology?
faq.answer: The GM of Sales at SM Technology is MD. Jabed.

faq.question: What services does SM Technology offer?
faq.answer: SM Technology provides mobile app development, website development, AI solutions, CMS development, and data entry services.

faq.question: What is the relationship between SM Technology and bdCalling IT?
faq.answer: SM Technology is a sister concern of bdCalling IT, which is a global company with six sister concerns.

faq.question: Which technologies does SM Technology use?
faq.answer: SM Technology works with React, Next.js, Laravel, Flutter, React Native, Python, Node.js, WordPress, and Strapi.

faq.question: How much does website development cost?
faq.answer: Website development at SM Technology starts at $2,500, depending on project requirements.

faq.question: How much does mobile app development cost?
faq.answer: Mobile app development starts at $3,500, with pricing depending on complexity and features.

faq.question: Does SM Technology offer AI solutions?
faq.answer: Yes, SM Technology provides AI-powered solutions, including chatbots, machine learning applications, and automation.

faq.question: Who is the owner of bdCalling IT?
faq.answer: The owner of bdCalling IT is MD. Monir Hossain.

faq.question: What are the sister concerns of bdCalling IT?
faq.answer: The sister concerns of bdCalling IT are: Spart Tech Agency, Softvence, SM Technology, Back Bancher, Galaxy, and BdCalling Academy.
